name: Jacob Van Meter
title: Mentor
about: Jacob is a software developer with a passion for learning and teaching. He is currently a student at the University of Waterloo, studying Computer Science and Mathematics. He is also a member of the Waterloo Computer Club, a student-run club that teaches students how to code. He is also a member of the Waterloo Computer Society.
